name: SERGS 2018 10 Years of Robotic Surgery
content: The Society of European Robotic Gynaecological Surgery (SERGS) reveals the latest advances in the field of robot assisted gynaecological surgery at SERGS 2018 Conference, Sept 27 - 29, Milan, Italy. The conference program will feature comprehensive state-of-the art summaries on gynaecologic surgical procedures assisted by robots by world premier robotic surgical experts, as well as interactive discussions of future developments of the robotic surgery field. SERGS 2018 will incorporate oral and poster sessions, bringing the latest research in robotic gynaecological surgery to attendees across Europe. Abstracts submissions will be open until June 15, 2018\. Don't miss out on the opportunity to join peers and key opinion leaders in Milan, Italy, September 27 â€“ 29th, 2018\. Get a head start, visit SERGS 2018 Conference website.
